Priest of the Earth Daychir:
You are performing a sacred trust, I am always ready to give a blessing.
Karna Maphr! Prosperity! Prosperity! These are the names of our goddess! Believe it away! And then you will be blessed! And your talent, and your abilities - the gift of the goddess, your successes and fame - also sent down by the goddess of good fortune. So thank her for a favor and bring her victim! Do not be sad, and do not complain, even now we are in a period of hardship and turmoil. Goddess just We sent them to the test. And we stand! Believe me, you, and ye shall find! What? What is one of the names Maphr? Blessing!
Do not forget! Goddess of the Earth is always there with you. You should always be people who can vote for the goddess for her grace. Be firm in your faith. The Goddess is always with us, and we all have to believe in it and follow it. Everything that happens - the idea of the goddess.
Remember this is always the same, if you want to grace it always is with you. Karna Maphr!
